name: Hybrid Hugo
description:
In Hybrid Hugo, you play as the mutant creation of mad scientist Dr. Hugo -- an amalgamation of human and animal parts crudely joined together to create the ultimate warrior.

Punch and kick your way through hordes of enemies in this futuristic beat 'em up. Oh, and be sure to equip any new limbs you find along the way -- the fresh meat will heal you.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys: move

Z: punch

X: kick

C: block

SPACE: spawn a body mod 

CREDITS:

Art & Animation: Max Lama and Conor Toland

Programming & Music: Max Mitchell

Made in under 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2021
